item.description:
Buon Giorno Amici,

About a year ago I began to looked into Facebook's ability to handle our meetup needs. As we approach our 3rd Anniversary, I have decided to move this group to Facebook.

Most of you are already on facebook so making this move won't be so hard. Type in "Connecticut's Viva Italia Group" into the search area and wala you are there. We will be able to have the same functionality we have now.

With that said, on June 23rd this group that I founded back in 2007 will no longer exist here on Meetup.

I hope to have you join me at our new address.

Thank you for your time!
item.name: Connecticut's Viva Italia Group - We're Moving
